alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 8:14PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Noxubee County through 845 PM CST... At 814 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Prairie Point, or 11 miles southwest of Pickensville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bigbee Valley around 825 PM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for northeastern and east central Mississippi.
